name: .NITZ File Extension
summary: Learn about .NITZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: Because NITZ files are encrypted, you cannot open them. At this time, there is no way to decrypt NITZ files. The best way to restore files encrypted by NITZ ransomware is to retrieve them from a recent backup or perform a System Restore.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
